Enchanted Pink.$description: A playful and magical pastel pink reminiscent of Speak Now’s whimsy and Taylor’s youthful sparkle

Folklore Fog.$description: A moody, dusky gray-purple that reflects the introspective and enchanting spirit of Folklore

Lavendar Haze.$description: A soft purple with dreamy vibes

Lover's Blush.$description: A soft, romantic mauve that captures the dreamy vibes of Taylor's Lover era, evoking sunsets and heartfelt moments

Red Velvet.$description: A rich, warm berry hue that recalls the passionate and iconic themes of Red

Reputation Rose.$description: A bold and dramatic crimson shade with hints of mystery
